   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(mnesia_external_backend_test).
   22: 
   23: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   24:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   25:          suite/0, all/0, groups/0]).
   26: 
   27: -export([conversion_from_external_to_disc_copies_results_in_data_loss_after_node_restart/1]).
   28: 
   29: -include("mnesia_test_lib.hrl").
   30: 
   31: -record(some_rec, {some_id :: atom(), some_int :: number(), some_string :: string()}).
   32: 
   33: -define(acquire(N, Config),
   34:         mnesia_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{init_test_case, [mnesia]},
   35:                                            delete_schema],
   36:                                           N, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE)).
   37: 
   38: all() -> 
   39:     [conversion_from_external_to_disc_copies_results_in_data_loss_after_node_restart].
   40: 
   41: groups() ->
   42:     [].
   43: 
   44: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   45:     mnesia_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   46: 
   47: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   48:     mnesia_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   49: 
   50: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   51:     Config.
   52: 
   53: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   54:     Config.
   55: 
   56: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[{ts_install_cth,[{nodenames,1}]}]}].
   57: 
   58: conversion_from_external_to_disc_copies_results_in_data_loss_after_node_restart(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   59:     Node = node(),
   60:     Data = [
   61:         #some_rec{some_id = a, some_int = 1, some_string = "something" },
   62:         #some_rec{some_id = b, some_int = 2, some_string = "anything"  },
   63:         #some_rec{some_id = c, some_int = 3, some_string = "everything"},
   64:         #some_rec{some_id = d, some_int = 4, some_string = "nothing"   }
   65:     ],
   66: 
   67:     [Node] = ?acquire(1, Config),
   68:     ok = mnesia:create_schema([Node]),
   69:     ok = mnesia:start(),
   70:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:add_backend_type(ext_ets, ext_test),
   71:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:add_backend_type(ext_dets, ext_test),
   72:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:create_table(table, [
   73:         {type, ordered_set},
   74:         {record_name, some_rec},
   75:         {attributes, record_info(fields, some_rec)},
   76:         {disc_copies, [Node]}
   77:     ]),
   78: 
   79:     ok = mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
   80:         lists:foreach(fun(Elem) -> mnesia:write(table, Elem, write) end, Data)
   81:     end),
   82: 
   83:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:change_table_copy_type(table, Node, ext_ets),
   84:     Data = mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
   85:         mnesia:match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'}, read) end
   86:     ),
   87: 
   88:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:change_table_copy_type(table, Node, disc_copies),
   89:     Data = mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
   90:         mnesia:match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'}, read) end
   91:     ),
   92: 
   93:     stopped = mnesia:stop(),
   94:     ok = mnesia:start(),
   95:     ok = mnesia:wait_for_tables([schema, table], 10000),
   96: 
   97:     Data = mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
   98:         mnesia:match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'}, read) end
   99:     ).
